overview: A holiday classic, a DVD recording of a yearly masterpiece showcased in Miami and Broward for all familiesâ€™ enjoyment, with the original choreography by Vladimir Issaev.  The ballet tells the story of Clara, who receives an unsuspected gift on Christmas Eve: The Nutcracker! The magic of this present allows the beautiful young lady to travel to the Land of Sweets after enduring an epic battle with the unique Rat King.
title: The Nutcracker
